nodes.bodyText:
Need consider several cases for timeout:

Hot is working on the Polling case?
How is it working with the server side retry logic header (429) ?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -212,6 +214,7 @@ public void write(int b) {
                     .withHttpClient(generateHttpClientWithProxy(null))
                     .withHttpLogOptions(new HttpLogOptions().setLogLevel(HttpLogDetailLevel.BODY_AND_HEADERS))
                     .withPolicy(new ResourceGroupTaggingPolicy())
+                    .withPolicy(new TimeoutPolicy(Duration.ofMinutes(1)))

nodes.bodyText:
Yes, so it is just added for unit test currently, since parallel test will cause timeout usually.
In my opinion,

The polling case could remain the same, but add logic for cancel if there are lots of time out.
The 429 handler should be added before timeout in the product situation.
